alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Elk; McKean; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 12:46AM EDT until August 25 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cameron County in north central Pennsylvania... Elk County in north central Pennsylvania... McKean County in north central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Warren County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 1246 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Allegany State Park to near Brookville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Bradford, Ridgway, Kane, Johnsonburg, Port Allegany, Sheffield, Emporium, Smethport, Wetmore, Shinglehouse and Betula. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
